Key Match Events: Yoshinobu Yamamoto pitched a stellar game with 6 1/3 innings, 1 hit, 1 earned run, 2 walks and 4 strikeouts.
Tommy Edman, Teoscar Hernández and Freddie Freeman all homered off Yankees starter Carlos Rodón.
Shohei Ohtani sustained a painful-looking shoulder injury while attempting to steal second base.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series heads to New York for Game 3, with the Yankees in as must-win of a situation as it can be without elimination on the line.
The Dodgers lead the World Series, 2 games to 0
Others: The Yankees will need a win with Clarke Schmidt on the mound against Walker Buehler in Game 3 on Monday.
The game was postponed due to rain delays until the next day.
